description.black-white:
The user cloaks itself with flame and
attacks. Building up more power,
it raises the user’s Speed stat.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user cloaks itself with flame and
attacks. Building up more power,
it raises the user’s Speed stat.
description.x-y:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks.
Then, building up more power,
the user raises its Speed stat.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks.
Then, building up more power,
the user raises its Speed stat.
description.sun-moon:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then,
building up more power, the user raises its
Speed stat.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then,
building up more power, the user raises its
Speed stat.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then,
building up more power, the user raises its
Speed stat.
description.sword-shield:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target.
Then, building up more power, the user raises its
Speed stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.
